name: Date Syrup

ingredients.notes: Medjool preferred, or any soft variety

instructions: If your dates are dry, soak them in hot water for 10–15 minutes, then drain.
Add pitted dates and 1 cup of water to a blender or food processor.
Blend until smooth, scraping down the sides as needed. Add more water a tablespoon at a time if too thick.
Optional: Pour the blended mixture into a saucepan and simmer on low heat for 10–15 minutes until thickened and glossy, stirring occasionally.
Let cool. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
